oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crises - Newsweek Report from Black America
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: race; African Americans; statistics; race relations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Short booklet, entitled, "Report from Black America", containing various polls relating to African-American attitudes.
